text: Brian Kilmeade (born May 7, 1964) is an American television personality. He co-hosts Fox's morning show, Fox & Friends, along with Steve Doocy and Ainsley Earhardt. He has written several fiction and nonfiction books, and hosts the Fox News Radio program Kilmeade and Friends. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:American television news anchors Category:American political writers Category:American political commentators Category:American novelists Category:Fox News people Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: Brian Kilmeade
